name: Shitty Thieves 2.0
description:
Shitty Thieves 2.0 is a co-op arcade game that I've been developing on and off since I and a small group made the original game for Brackeys 2021 Game Jam. 

A simple game with simple controls, but it can still take some time to really get the hang of it, especially when playing solo.

You control the two human hazards: The Raccoon and  The Seagull.

  • It's the Raccoon's job to hit the Gunguys and the Hotdogmen. Avoid net attacks!
  • It's the Seagull's job to shit on the Netguys and the Moneymen. Avoid flying bullets and people!
  • Get points by collecting Moneymen and Hotdogmen drops.
